Statute.Title: Unemployment Insurance Benefit Entitlement Adjustments (Pension Payments)
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Réexamen de l’admissibilité aux prestations d’assurance-chômage (pension), Loi sur le)

Minister.Text: Minister of Human Resources Development see 1996, c. 11, s. 96

CIF.Text: CIF, 1987, c. 17 deemed in force 05.04.87 see s. 10
